page.title: 15Our Hopes and Fears Mossley
page.content: The children of class 1 at Mossley C.E.Primary School decided that some thoughts about the future would be of interest and value to readers and researchers in years to come.They considered their 'hopes and fears'with some interesting results. The one issue that dominates their thoughts is Nuclear War.50% of the class say this is their greatest fear. Their strongest hope is for peace in the world.Nearly 30% hope for a One Nation World.25% of the class are worried about the destruction of the Tropical Rain Forests.Other issues which are relevant are'finding a job,feeding the world,vandalism,cures for illnesses.Some are worried that computers and robots will 'take over'.Others look forward to links with life from other galaxies.
